text: History with Lourd is a 30-minute documentary show about history lessons. It airs every Saturday at 10:00-10:30 PM on TV5 and AksyonTV.History with Lourd on News5 ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Episode Title ! Episode # !
